title: CLASSIFICATION: NO EMPLOYEES IN THE WARNING DESIGNS OF Imperialists
content:
EVERYTHING 14/3 - 6:00 PM IN PIRAEUS
(in the courtyard of St. Nicholas)

The country's involvement in the war plans of the imperialists is deepening daily. The mission of the Greek frigate to the Red Sea on behalf of the US and the EU has nothing to do with the safeguarding of security, but the exact opposite: it intensifies the war climate triggered by US and EU imperialists, and exposes our people to huge dangers.

Just yesterday, the ND government, always willing to sacrifice the people for imperialist interests, ratified (with PASOK votes) in Parliament the two Memorandums of Cooperation of the Ministries of Defense, Greece and the US, for the placement of Greek staff. US and US Special Business Administration.

On the pretext of conservation of peace and security, the dependent local ruling class and its political staff support and contribute to the peoples of the peoples in Ukraine and Palestine, and have turned the whole country into a US -based basis into a huge base of imperialist. murder machines.

At the same wavelength, the shipbuilding capital sacrifices on the altar of profit the lives of seafarers sent to the Red Sea. The three dead and six injured seafarers are the tranquil proof.

We call on the people and the workers to stand up against this bloodthirsty policy. To denounce the involvement of our country in the war and to make their solidarity with the Palestinian people.

  • IMMEDIATELY DESTRUCTION OF THE COUNTRY FROM MARMICAL DESIGNS.
  • Return the frigate from Eritrea Seafood.
  • OUTSIDE-NATO-ROOM AND EU FROM GREECE
  • Front of People against War and Imperialism
  • LEFTERIA IN PALESTINI - STATE SINGLE PALESTINIAKO, FROM THE SEA TO THE RIVER



CLUB
author: Κ.Μπ.
